cyclomatic_complexity.note: Good for us to know, but we're sometimes okay with localized complexity when we have good test coverage.

missing_fat_arrows.note: There are plenty of dynamic `this` cases beyond simple class methods: event handlers, dynamic properties, even Mocha tests.

newlines_after_classes.note: We prefer this, but it won't be a show-stopper.

no_implicit_braces.note: TODO: This fails on multi-line cases sometimes. https://github.com/clutchski/coffeelint/issues/459

no_implicit_parens.note: This is definitely idiomatic CoffeeScript: `foo a, b, c`

no_plusplus.note: We're okay with the use of ++ and --.

no_unnecessary_double_quotes.note: We prefer single quotes wherever possible, but this won't be a show-stopper.

no_unnecessary_fat_arrows.note: We're okay with preemptive uses of fat arrows.

non_empty_constructor_needs_parens.note: Similar to `no_implicit_parens`, this is definitely idiomatic CoffeeScript: `new Foo a, b, c`

space_operators.note: TODO: We're okay with no spaces for default params (e.g. `opts={}`). Exception being worked on: https://github.com/clutchski/coffeelint/pull/438

spacing_after_comma.note: This is definitely idiomatic CoffeeScript: `foo a, b, c`

transform_messes_up_line_numbers.note: This is just a recommended setting for CoffeeLint.
